title: Hydrodeoxygenation of bio-oil model compounds over Ni- and Pt-catalysts supported on hydrophobized halloysite nanotubes
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00518J, Paper
Gleb Zasypalov, Vladimir Klimovsky, Egor Abramov, Anna Vutolkina, Ekaterina Mustakimova, Sergey Verevkin, Valentin Stytsenko, Aleksandr Glotov
Waterproof catalysts supported on hydrophobized halloysite nanotubes for hydrodeoxygenation of bio-oil aromatics compounds derived from lignocellulose.
